title: NRL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 12 Deputy Associate Posts
description: The Numaligarh Refinery Limited (NRL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 12 Deputy Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the NRL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,...
